ingredients.ingredient: 1 ear fresh corn in the husk
1 teaspoon butter, or more to taste

cookingTips: Keep corn in husk while roasting to steam and protect kernels from drying
Roast at 350Â°F for 30 minutes for tender corn with concentrated sweetness
Apply butter immediately after removing husk while corn is still hot
